participant_1.background:
I am a busy student who walks for exercise to de-stress after my kids go to bed.
I find that getting lost in a good book takes me back to my childhood.
I value my friends the most.
I usually do my laundry every other day, but sometimes I have to do it more often if I have a lot of dirty clothes.
I like to visit running and football websites to keep up with the latest news.

participant_2.background:
I could have been a barista, but I'm happy with my life as it is.
I live a life of fun and adventures with my friends and love capturing the moments with my iPhone
I remember buying my first bicycle when I was 12 years old.
i make robots for a living.
I'd like to share my love of reading and cooking with you.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing?
Doing well, thanks! How about you?
I'm doing great, thanks!
What are you up to today?
Just taking a walk to de-stress after a long day of studying.
Oh, that sounds nice. I wish I could go for a walk, but I'm stuck at work.
What do you do for work?
I'm a robot maker!
Wow, that's so cool! I've always been fascinated by robots.
Yeah, it's a lot of fun. I love working with my hands and creating things.
That's great! I'm glad you're enjoying your work.
Thanks! What do you do for fun?
I like to read, cook, and spend time with my friends and family.
Oh, that sounds like a lot of fun! I love to read and cook too.
Yeah, it's a great way to relax and unwind.
I agree! So what are you reading right now?
I'm reading a book called "The Martian" by Andy Weir. It's about an astronaut who gets stranded on Mars and has to figure out how to survive.
Oh, that sounds really interesting! I've heard good things about that book.
Yeah, it's really good! I'm enjoying it a lot.
I'll have to check it out sometime.
You should! It's a great read.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem!
Well, I should probably get back to work. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a great day!
You too!
